        This method creates a Book in the book table
        Parameters:
        authorId - : input parameter for id of author
        publisherId - : input parameter for id of publisher
        book - : input parameter for Book object to be created
        Returns:
        : It returns a Book object in JSON format

      • update

        Book update(int bookId,
            Book changedBook)
     throws ResourceNotFoundException
        This method deletes a Book in the book table
        Parameters:
        bookId - : input parameter for id of book
        changedBook - : input parameter book to update original book information in JSON format.
        Returns:
        : It returns a Book Object in JSON format.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - thrown if the bookId is not found.

        : It returns a Book Object in JSON format.
        Throws:

        This method searches for a Book in the book table using book id

        Returns:
        : It returns a List of Book Objects in JSON format.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - thrown if the bookId is not found.

      • searchByTitle

        java.util.List<Book> searchByTitle(java.lang.String title)
                            throws ResourceNotFoundException
        This method searches a Book in the book table using book title
        Parameters:
        title - : title of book object to be searched in the database
        Returns:
        : It returns a list of Book objects with the given title.
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - thrown if the title is not found.

        Parameters:

        : It returns a list of Book objects.
